TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DragDrop extends System.Object
public ref class DragDrop abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于启动拖放操作的帮助器方法和字段（包括开始拖放操作的方法），并提供用于添加和移除拖放相关事件处理程序的工具。

span.span: Provides helper methods and fields for initiating drag-and-drop operations, including a method to begin a drag-and-drop operation, and facilities for adding and removing drag-and-drop related event handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放通常指一种数据传输方法：使用鼠标（或一些其他指针设备）选择一个或多个对象，将其拖至 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中的某些所需拖放目标之上并放置。Drag-and-drop commonly refers to a method of data transfer that involves using a mouse (or some other pointing device) to select one or more objects, dragging these objects over some desired drop target in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], and dropping them. 拖放操作是类似于副本 （或剪切）-和-粘贴用于将数据从一个对象或应用程序到另一个传输的操作。A drag-and-drop operation is analogous to a copy (or cut)-and-paste operation that is used to transfer data from one object or application to another. 拖放操作通常涉及到两个参与方： 从拖动源其中拖动的数据源和放置目标用于接收放置的数据。Drag-and-drop operations typically involve two parties: a drag source from which the dragged data originates and a drop target which receives the dropped data. 拖放操作所需的事件和方法是在 类中定义的。The events and methods required for drag-and-drop operations are defined in the class. 拖放事件是可以附加到任何的附加的事件或。The drag-and-drop events are attached events that can be attached to any or . 拖动源和放置目标可能会在同一个应用程序或不同的应用程序的 UI 元素。The drag source and drop target may be UI elements in the same application or in different applications. 但是，放置目标必须知道如何处理通过拖动源传递的数据。However, the drop target must know how to process the data being passed by the drag source. > [!NOTE] > 和类包含的拖放事件的别名，因此，这些类作为基类继承时，事件将出现在类成员列表中。The and classes contain aliases for the drag-and-drop events so that the events appear in the class members list when these classes are inherited as a base class. 当事件处理程序附加到这些类之一上拖放事件后时，该处理程序附加到基础事件和它们接收事件数据的同一个实例。When you attach an event handler to a drag-and-drop event on one of these classes, the handler is attached to the underlying event and they receive the same instance of event data. 有关示例，请参阅 。For example, see . 拖动源通过调用静态 方法和向其传递传输的数据来启动拖放操作。The drag source initiates a drag-and-drop operation by calling the static method and passing the transferred data to it. 元素通常会处理以下事件时作为拖动源：An element typically handles the following events when it is a drag source: - - 元素通常会处理以下事件时的放置目标：An element typically handles the following events when it is a drop target: - - - - 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[拖放概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md)。For more information and examples, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md).

param.name: element
param.span: 要对其添加事件处理程序的依赖对象（ 或 ）。

span.span: The dependency object (a or ) to which to add the event handler.

param.name: handler
param.span: 一个委托，用于引用要添加的处理程序方法。

span.span: A delegate that references the handler method to be added.

summary.span: 将 事件处理程序添加到指定的依赖对象。

span.span: Adds a event handler to a specified dependency object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时将对象拖入元素的边界。The event occurs when an object is dragged into the element's bounds. 此方法将添加的处理程序的冒泡版本事件。This method adds a handler for the bubbling version of the event. 若要添加的处理程序的此事件的隧道版本，请参阅。To add a handler for the tunneling version of this event, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件在拖放操作中，发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。The event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation, and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled. 此方法将添加的处理程序的隧道版本事件。This method adds a handler for the tunneling version of the event. 若要添加的处理程序的此事件的冒泡版本，请参阅。To add a handler for the bubbling version of this event, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件在拖放操作中，发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。The event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation, and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled. 此方法将添加的处理程序的冒泡版本事件。This method adds a handler for the bubbling version of the event. 若要添加的处理程序的此事件的隧道版本，请参阅。To add a handler for the tunneling version of this event, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.DragDropEffects DoDragDrop (System.Windows.DependencyObject dragSource, object data, System.Windows.DragDropEffects allowedEffects);

.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Windows.DragDropEffects DoDragDrop(class System.Windows.DependencyObject dragSource, object data, valuetype System.Windows.DragDropEffects allowedEffects) cil managed
Public Shared Function DoDragDrop (dragSource As DependencyObject, data As Object, allowedEffects As DragDropEffects) As DragDropEffects
public: static System::Windows::DragDropEffects DoDragDrop(System::Windows::DependencyObject ^ dragSource, System::Object ^ data, System::Windows::DragDropEffects allowedEffects);

param.name: dragSource
param.span: 对依赖项对象的引用（该对象是被拖动数据的源）。

span.span: A reference to the dependency object that is the source of the data being dragged.

param.name: data
param.span: 包含被拖动数据的数据对象。

span.span: A data object that contains the data being dragged.

param.name: allowedEffects
param.span: 值中的一个，指定拖放操作的允许效果。

span.span: One of the values that specifies permitted effects of the drag-and-drop operation.

summary.span: 启动拖放操作。

span.span: Initiates a drag-and-drop operation.

returns.span: 值中的一个，指定在拖放操作期间执行的最终效果。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the final effect that was performed during the drag-and-drop operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它负责应用程序，以确定拖动时，，然后启动拖放操作。It is the responsibility of your application to determine when a drag occurs, and then initiate the drag-and-drop operation. 通常，这是当和通过拖动元素发生的事件序列。Typically, this is when a and sequence of events occurs over the element to be dragged. 通过调用静态启动拖放操作方法并传递给它的传输的数据。You initiate the drag-and-drop operation by calling the static method and passing the transferred data to it. 如有必要， 方法将使 中的数据自动换行。The method will automatically wrap the data in a if necessary. 为了更好地控制数据格式，可将 中的数据换行，然后再将其传递至 方法。For greater control over the data format, you can wrap the data in a before passing it to the method. 从返回的值method 为的值是中放置目标的设置属性事件处理程序。The value returned from the method is the value of the property set in the drop target’s event handler. 如果返回值不匹配之一`allowedEffects`调用中指定，未执行拖放操作。If the return value does not match one of the `allowedEffects` specified in the call to , the drag-and-drop operation is not performed. ## Examples 下面的示例显示了如何从 元素的 事件处理程序中启动拖放操作，以将其作为拖动源。The following example shows how to initiate a drag-and-drop operation from the event handler of an element to make it a drag source. 传输的数据是椭圆形的 属性的字符串表示形式。The transferred data is the string representation of the ellipse’s property. 数据传递到字符串形式的方法和自动包装在。The data is passed to the method as a string and is automatically wrapped in a . [!code-csharp[DragDropSnippets#DoDragDrop](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#dodragdrop)] [!code-vb[DragDropSnippets#DoDragDrop](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/dragdropsnippets/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#dodragdrop)]

span.span: or is .

summary.span: 标识 附加事件

span.span: Identifies the attached event

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件在拖放操作中，发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。The event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation, and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled. 此字段标识的隧道版本事件。This field identifies the tunneling version of the event. 此事件的冒泡版本的标识符，请参阅。For an identifier for the bubbling version of this event, see .
